ResearchProjectDef.label: Passive Machines
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research into passive machines that provide medical care without electricity.
ResearchProjectDef.descriptionDiscovered: The requirement for medical IV's and other passive machines.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Powered Machines
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research into powered machines that provide medical care by requiring a constant electricity draw.
ResearchProjectDef.descriptionDiscovered: The requirement for life-support and other passive machines.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Bloodstem Infusion
ResearchProjectDef.description: Using mechanites, enzymes and some good ol' bloodstem you think you can create raw, synthesised blood.
ResearchProjectDef.descriptionDiscovered: Using mechanites, enzymes and some good ol' bloodstem you've managed to create raw, synthesised blood.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Nutrition IV
ResearchProjectDef.description: A nutritional drip. For, y'know, nutrition. Place adjacent to a medical bed for highest effectiveness.
ResearchProjectDef.descriptionDiscovered: By shoving food inside of a bag and letting it slowly drip into someone's body you've managed to make your first IV Drip.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Painkiller IV
ResearchProjectDef.description: A painkiller drip. Kills pain. Place adjacent to a medical bed for highest effectiveness.
ResearchProjectDef.descriptionDiscovered: Having learned from your nutritional IV research you begin to experiment more with drips in general and have created a painkiller IV

ResearchProjectDef.label: Antibiotic IV
ResearchProjectDef.description: An anitbiotic drip used to speed up illness recovery. Place adjacent to a medical bed for highest effectiveness.
ResearchProjectDef.descriptionDiscovered: Pushing antiobitics straight into the blood stream is very effective, hence why you made an antibiotic IV.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Blood IV
ResearchProjectDef.description: A drip for realtime blood transfusions. Slows down the rate a colonist bleeds out. Place adjacent to a medical bed for highest effectiveness.
ResearchProjectDef.descriptionDiscovered: You've come to discover a variant of blood which anyone's body accepts. You've learned to use it for universal blood transfusions - in real time.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Medical Injections
ResearchProjectDef.description: Prerequisite needed for medical injections e.g Morphine and Epinephrine.
ResearchProjectDef.descriptionDiscovered: You've realised that you can squeeze important liquids into an even smaller area than small plastic bags.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Epinephrine Autoinjector
ResearchProjectDef.description: An EpiPen. Shoots adrenaline straight into a person's veins and gives them a temporary consciousness boost.
ResearchProjectDef.descriptionDiscovered: An EpiPen. Shoots adrenaline straight into a person's veins and gives them a temporary consciousness boost.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Injectable Coagulant
ResearchProjectDef.description: A medical grade blood thickener used to temporarily coagulate blood and ultimately slow bleeding.
ResearchProjectDef.descriptionDiscovered: A medical grade blood thickener used to temporarily coagulate blood and ultimately slow bleeding.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Life Support Machines
ResearchProjectDef.description: Prerequisite into large machines used to treat life threatening issues and keep severely ill colonist's stable.
ResearchProjectDef.descriptionDiscovered: Prerequisite into large machines used to treat life threatening issues and keep severely ill colonist's stable.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mechanical Ventilator
ResearchProjectDef.description: An intrusive, mechanical machine that acts as a colonist's lungs by 'breathing' for them.
ResearchProjectDef.descriptionDiscovered: An intrusive, mechanical machine that acts as a colonist's lungs by 'breathing' for them.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Dialysis Machine
ResearchProjectDef.description: A large, expensive machine that replaces a colonist's kidney and liver function and filters the blood.
ResearchProjectDef.descriptionDiscovered: A large, expensive machine that replaces a colonist's kidney and liver function and filters the blood.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Heart/Lung Bypass
ResearchProjectDef.description: Life support machine that bypasses the need for lungs and a heart. Very expensive, intrusive but also effective.
ResearchProjectDef.descriptionDiscovered: Life support machine that bypasses the need for lungs and a heart. Very expensive, intrusive but also effective.
